title: Quick Bread Dough

notes: Works well for pizza crust, cinnamon rolls, dinner rolls, pigs in a blanket, cheese bread, etc.
Because this is not a traditional rising dough, it is not supposed rise very high.

directions: Add yeast and sugar to water in large bowl or stand mixer.
Add oil and salt into yeast mixture.
Gradually add flour and knead for 5 minutes.
Let rise 10 mintues, covering the bowl.
Use for any recipe that requires bread dough.
